content: *cool summer nights call for the perfect cozy layer meet the savannah cardi * when the evenings start to cool off the savannah cardi is your go-to light layer this breezy tunisian crochet cardigan is full of personality making it a stylish addition to any summer-to-fall wardrobe designed with beginners in mind it s quick to make and easy to customize so you can adjust the fit and style to suit your taste *new to tunisian crochet don t worry this cardigan is beginner-friendly and includes a tutorial video * * view this pattern for free on my blog 1 * **materials** * 655 715 795 865 935 990 1060 1130 1200 yards worsted weight yarn sample made with lion brand landscapes breeze in the colorway willow * 8mm tunisian crochet hook * 6mm traditional crochet hook * scissors * tape measure * tapestry needle * locking stitch markers * wet blocking supplies **techniques** * tunisian crochet foundation forward and return pass * tunisian arrowhead stitch * seaming crochet * crochet ribbing * wet blocking technique **measurements** sizes available for finished bust 38 - 70 to fit sizes 28 - 62 // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 https //tlycblog com/savannah-cardi-a-free-tunisian-crochet-lacy-sweater-pattern/
